name: Counter Modern Duty Ops Fighting Edition.
name_original: Counter Modern Duty Ops Fighting Edition.
description: What If,  A Fps tactical shooter became a fighting game made on Mugen Engine.There are 12 characters and 15 stages in this game.Are you Soldier to play this game? Which Side are you? Counter Terrorist or a Terrorist? Pick your side.. If yu like fighting or shooting. Download this game today...
